resourceTemplates.name: Get Excel worksheet list
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves all worksheets (tabs) from the specified Excel file (OneDrive/SharePoint itemId required).

resourceTemplates.name: Get Excel used range
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves the range of all used cells from the specified worksheet.

resourceTemplates.name: Get Excel tables
resourceTemplates.description: Returns a list of all tables (table objects) in the specified Excel file.

resourceTemplates.name: Get Excel table rows
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves all rows from a specific table in the specified Excel file.

resourceTemplates.name: Get Excel cell range
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves a specific cell range (e.g., B2:F20) from a worksheet in the specified Excel file.

resourceTemplates.name: Get Excel named ranges
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves all named ranges in the specified Excel file.

resourceTemplates.name: Get Excel table columns
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves all columns from a specific table in the specified Excel file.

resourceTemplates.name: Get Excel workbook metadata
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves basic metadata for the specified Excel workbook, including worksheet and table info.

resourceTemplates.name: Get Excel worksheet charts
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves all charts from a specific worksheet in the specified Excel file.

resourceTemplates.name: Get worksheet tables
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves all tables in a specific worksheet of the specified Excel file.
